Translations.Text: bulkkoch-eul twigineun mal-eul dugo maeng sehamyeo
sillo ingan-eun junimkke gamsahal jul moleudeola
ingan-eun geuga haenghan geos-eul jeung-eon hal geos-imae
mudeomsog-e issneun geosdeul-i bakk-eulo nawa sansanhi heut-eojigo
geuui simjung-e issneun geosdeul-i balg hyeojimyeo
geunal junimkkeseo geugeosdeul-eul a sim-eulo chungmanhadaneun geos-eul ingan-eun alji moshaneunyo
